job.title: Embedded Software Engineer
job.description: Responsibilities:The Embedded System Engineer is responsible for developing on or deploying different test environments and capabilities on the platforms. They will develop and integrate tests. They will also need to be able to design and execute experiments to triage issues.Minimum QualificationsBachelor's degree in Engineering, Information Systems, Computer Science, or related field.1+ years Experience with Embedded System1+ years Software Engineering or related work experience.1+ years experience with Programming Language such as C, C++, Java, Python, etc.Familiarity with debugging via JTAG interfaceHands-on Knowledge of Linux (installation, configuration and usage, distros)Knowledge of Data center Servers. Storage solutions, and PeripheralsAbility to use oscilloscopes and logic analyzersExperience with SOC architecture, design , verification, or validationStrong Familiarity with Android.
